alert.note: Alert for Butler; Chautauqua; Cowley; Elk; Greenwood; Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 26 at 9:58PM CST until February 26 at 11:15PM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Elk County in southeastern Kansas... Cowley County in south central Kansas... Butler County in south central Kansas... Southeastern Sumner County in south central Kansas... Western Chautauqua County in southeastern Kansas... Western Greenwood County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 1115 PM CST. * At 958 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Whitewater to 6 miles west of Chilocco, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Arkansas City, Winfield, Andover, Augusta, Rose Hill, Eureka, Douglass, Towanda, Oxford, Benton, Udall, Leon, Howard, Cedar Vale, Burden, Potwin, Moline, Dexter and Elbing. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 56 and 96. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Butler; Chautauqua; Cowley; Elk; Greenwood; Sumner
